abstract: Resolution released by New Brunswick Faculty Council at Rutgers says football coach Kyle Flood's punishment for misconduct is too lenient.
lead_paragraph: A resolution stops short of demanding the dismissal of Coach Kyle Flood, who has been suspended for three games.

headline.main: Faculty Council at Rutgers Says Coach’s Punishment Is Too Lenient
headline.print_headline: Faculty Council at Rutgers Says Coach’s Punishment Is Too Lenient

snippet: A resolution stops short of demanding the dismissal of Coach Kyle Flood, who has been suspended for three games.
